Uses of Interface
javax.microedition.amms.control.EffectControl

Packages that use EffectControl
javax.microedition.amms.control This package contains Controls for setting formats, for defining the effect processing network structure and for setting the audio panning. 
javax.microedition.amms.control.audioeffect This package contains EffectControls for audio and related assisting Controls. 
javax.microedition.amms.control.imageeffect This package contains EffectControls for video and for still images. 
 

Uses of EffectControl in javax.microedition.amms.control
 

Methods in javax.microedition.amms.control that return EffectControl
 EffectControl[] EffectOrderControl.getEffectOrders()
          Returns the current positions of the effects in the effect processing chain.
 

Methods in javax.microedition.amms.control with parameters of type EffectControl
 int EffectOrderControl.getEffectOrder(EffectControl effect)
          Returns the current position of the effect in the effect processing chain.
 int EffectOrderControl.setEffectOrder(EffectControl effect, int order)
          Sets the order of the effect in the effect chain.
 

Uses of EffectControl in javax.microedition.amms.control.audioeffect
 

Subinterfaces of EffectControl in javax.microedition.amms.control.audioeffect
 interface AudioVirtualizerControl
          AudioVirtualizerControl is an effect to virtualize audio channels.
 interface ChorusControl
          ChorusControl is an interface for manipulating the settings of an audio effect called chorus and its special case flanger.
 interface EqualizerControl
          EqualizerControl is an audio EffectControl for manipulating the equalization settings of a Player(s).
 interface ReverbControl
          ReverbControl is an interface for manipulating the settings of an audio effect called reverb.
 

Uses of EffectControl in javax.microedition.amms.control.imageeffect
 

Subinterfaces of EffectControl in javax.microedition.amms.control.imageeffect
 interface ImageEffectControl
          ImageFilter is an image effect that can be used to set various image filters such as monochrome and negative.
 interface ImageTonalityControl
          ImageTonalityControl is an effect that can be used to set various image settings such as brightness, contrast and gamma.
 interface ImageTransformControl
          ImageTransformControl is used to crop, zoom, mirror, flip, stretch and rotate images.
 interface OverlayControl
          OverlayControl controls the setting of overlay images on top of video or still image.
 interface WhiteBalanceControl
          WhiteBalanceControl is an image/video effect for altering the white balance.
